posts.post_content:
Now the Izzet are thinking with portals.  
And they can take all their compagnon cubes with them if they can afford to pay ![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol)!  
  
Hard to imagine this only takes them a single blue mana while ancient mages had to gather the high concentration of three blue mana for a single [teleport](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=teleport).  
Ladies and gentlemen: *This* is the miracle of technology. *This* is progress. *This* is [Overrun](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Overrun) by Overload.

Ladies and gentlemen: This is the miracle of technology. This is progress. This is Overrun by Overload.
